1. open.description: The opening price of the stock on the given day

2. high.description: The highest price reached by the stock during the day

3. low.description: The lowest price reached by the stock during the day

4. close.description: The closing price of the stock on the given day

5. adjusted close.description: The adjusted closing price which accounts for any corporate actions such as dividends and splits

6. volume.description: The trading volume of the stock on the given day

7. dividend amount.description: The dividend amount distributed on the given day

8. split coefficient.description: The factor by which the stock has been split, if applicable
